name: 3 Circles
description:
Find words using photos, remove the lock and find the last piece of the puzzle!

Find 3 words to remove the lock. Use images to help you. Guess what these three photos have in common. You can tap on the picture to zoom in for a closer look. Some answers are straightforward, some are quite tricky. Enjoy this addictive new brainteaser!

Features:
• Less typing, more fun!
• Play in English, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish or Portuguese.
• New way to play word search.
• New kind of word association game.

If you like pics and word association games, this puzzle is for you!
